short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display ChatGPT response alongside search engine results
short.es: Mostrar la respuesta de ChatGPT junto con los resultados de la búsqueda en el motor de búsqueda
short.fr: Afficher la réponse de ChatGPT à côté des résultats des moteurs de recherche
short.ko: ChatGPT의 응답과 검색 엔진 결과를 함께 표시하라
short.ru: Отображение ответа ChatGPT вместе с результатами поиска
short.uk: Показати відповідь ChatGPT з результатами пошуку
short.zh_CN: 在搜索引擎结果中同时显示ChatGPT的回答

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing ChatGPT for Qwant! This extension enhances your search experience by integrating the power of ChatGPT, the state-of-the-art language model developed by OpenAI. With this extension, you can now search the web using natural language, just like you would with a human. Simply type in your query as a question or statement, and ChatGPT will understand your intent and provide relevant results. Say goodbye to keyword-stuffing and hello to a more intuitive search experience. Give it a try and see the difference for yourself. Download the ChatGPT Search Extension for Chrome today!

ChatGPT for Qwant also allows you to personalize your search experience by learning from your previous searches and providing more accurate results. As you use the extension, it will understand your preferences and tailor the results to match your needs.

In addition, the extension also features a built-in chat function, allowing you to have a conversation with ChatGPT to help you find what you're looking for. Whether you need help navigating a website, finding specific information, or just want to learn more about a topic, ChatGPT is here to assist you.

The extension is easy to use and seamlessly integrates with your existing search engine. Simply click on the extension icon and start searching with ChatGPT. It is compatible with all major search engines, including Google, Bing, and Yahoo.

ChatGPT for Qwant is a game-changer for anyone who wants a more efficient and personalized search experience. Download it now and experience the power of natural language search.

Download ChatGPT for Qwant today!

open source on Github: https://github.com/M-kasinski/chat-gpt-qwant-extension
